Finally, the rise of authoritarianism in several parts of the world is also a major concern. It undermines democratic values and can lead to can lead to human rights abuses.

However, remember that these are just some of the potential threats. The centrality and delicate balance of democracies require constant attention to various other factors too.

Transformers are a type of machine learning model introduced in natural language processing (NLP), which is about computers understanding and interpreting human language. 

The key idea of Transformers is attention—which part of the input is relevant to making the next prediction or whether to "pay attention" to. This helps the model focus on the crucial parts of the language when making predictions, just like humans do while reading a text.

Imagine that you're reading a book. You might not remember or focus on every single word from the start to the end, rather you would focus more on the plot or the key events. That's similar to what the Transformer model does. It adapts its focus to the important parts of the input data when making decisions. 

This "attention" feature makes them extremely powerful for NLP tasks and they have been the basis for many developments in NLP, including technology like GPT-3 and BERT models.
